channel.title: Urban / Grunge - Original gallery layout!
channel.description:
Hey guys! I did this layout for a client, turns out he was a timewaster, but I sold it eventually to another buyer. I spent about 7 hours on this, using trial and error. It's a fully layered PSD layout.
I want CC, advice and feedback on the[b] graphics[/b]! that's why I haven't posted it in the web design section!
You can view it [url=http://www.jamesy.net/layout.png]here[/url]!
I'll update this topic with more information later, but I'm kinda busy at the moment :)
-[url=http://www.jamesy.net]James![/url]

item.title: Urban / Grunge - Original gallery layout!
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

What position of power do you believe you have over me? You can’t tell me to do anything. 50 rep and you think you get to tell people what to do? Let me tell you, your Rep doesn’t mean anything. You’re nothing. Trash.

I am not “Trash”. I am not the one that sits on his computer all day acting like a tough guy to the people on the other side of the world. If you think im a piece of trash for telling you to shut up and stop flaming other people then you should go get a life you piece of shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Urban / Grunge - Original gallery layout!
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:7, topic:201699”][quote author=``jason link=topic=266362.msg2201744#msg2201744 date=1208841822]

Ew.

you learn to stfu.
…
[/quote]

What position of power do you believe you have over me? You can’t tell me to do anything. 50 rep and you think you get to tell people what to do? Let me tell you, your Rep doesn’t mean anything. You’re nothing. Trash.[/quote]

You’re the kind of guy that ruins these forums. That’s probably why I left, and since, I’ve found much better communities, several design + development courses, and I’ve made a considerable amount of money from putting my skills into action.

Rather have that that stay here, and listen to hundreds of adolescent nerds grade-grubbing, and flaming other people’s work rather than helping them develop and improve.

Read full topic

item.title: Urban / Grunge - Original gallery layout!
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I think it’s great, only thing i would change is to get rid of all black colours, I don’t really feel like they should be there as not many grunge pieces have pure black, it’s normally a grey or rusty brown.

Maybe put some splats around the place?

Read full topic

item.title: Urban / Grunge - Original gallery layout!
item.dc:creator: @YupolaScape YupolaScape
item.description:
@YupolaScape wrote:

I like it, but it could of been more, seemless is the word I think. well, smoother. But i suppose smooth isnt noramlly orientated with grunge and urban design.
